name: Push For Emor
description: Push For Emor is an open world(s) SciFi FPS RPG with light RTS building elements thrown in for good measure. Fight your way across 11 planets, engage in space combat, disable enemy craft and board enemy wrecks, explore abandoned space stations and defeat evil planet governors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-4590 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Any
